commands.name: Flash
commands.command: cd ${workspaceFolder}/firmware/sparkfun_nrf52840_mini/s140/armgcc; adafruit-nrfutil dfu genpkg --sd-req 0xFFFE --dev-type 0x0052 --application _build/nrf52840_xxaa.hex  _build/dfu-package.zip; adafruit-nrfutil --verbose dfu serial --package _build/dfu-package.zip -p COM11 -b 115200 --singlebank --touch 1200

commands.name: make & flash
commands.command: docker exec -it ${workspaceFolderBasename} bash -c 'cd /project/firmware/sparkfun_nrf52840_mini/s140/armgcc; make -j`nproc`';cd ${workspaceFolder}/firmware/sparkfun_nrf52840_mini/s140/armgcc; adafruit-nrfutil dfu genpkg --sd-req 0xFFFE --dev-type 0x0052 --application _build/nrf52840_xxaa.hex  _build/dfu-package.zip; adafruit-nrfutil --verbose dfu serial --package _build/dfu-package.zip -p COM11 -b 115200 --singlebank --touch 1200
